definition: not expressed, an enlisted man of the lowest rank in the Army or Marines
details:
adjective
- not expressed
= example: not expressed
= synonyms: secret
- concerning one person exclusively
= synonyms: individual
- concerning things deeply private and personal
= example: concerning things deeply private and personal
- confined to particular persons or groups or providing privacy
= example: confined to particular persons or groups or providing privacy
noun
- an enlisted man of the lowest rank in the Army or Marines
= example: an enlisted man of the lowest rank in the Army or Marines
= synonyms: buck private, common soldier
